name: Godzilla (itch)
description:
Welcome to my first video game!

input: azerty

ctrl: crouch

switch: E when you have 10 coins

kick: M when you have the second skin

dab: R (yes :) 

there are two different forms:
the first one allows to recover pieces 
the second allows you to attack and make a double jump.
You have to kill all four of your enemies to win.

Thanks to Nogam who has ENORMOSOUSLY helped me ;)
